description: ff. 109. 191 x 145; 150 x 115 mm. 19 lin. Muḥarram 673. Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Masʻūd al-Dahhānī. Riwāyah of Bishr ibn Ghiyāth. Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 291 (XV). Incip.: ... قال محمد بن الحسن ... واذا أراد الرجل الصلوة فلىتوضأ
author: Shaybānī, Muḥammad ibn al-ḥasan, ca. 750-804 or 5.
title: Kitāb al-Ṣalāh.
creator: Shaybānī, Muḥammad ibn al-ḥasan, ca. 750-804 or 5.
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
